faqsSection.howMuchForSoftware: How much do you charge for a software (web / mobile)
faqsSection.howMuchForSoftwareAnswer: it depends on what application type it is. and what kind of features it possesses . once you tell us about your project we will be able to put a charge record for your project. for example ecommerce projects with typical functionalities usually are worth at least 5000 MAD
faqsSection.howMuchForHostingAnswer: hosting usually costs at least 30 MAD per month. It can cost a lot more depending on your requirements. Hosting prices usually increase the more website visitors you have.
faqsSection.doYouOfferPaymentSchedule: Do you offer a payment schedule?
faqsSection.doYouOfferPaymentScheduleAnswer: yes, we split the payment into two. The first 50% is usually taken once you have seen the mockup of your homepage and youâ€™re happy to move forward. The following 50% is taken after the project is complete.
